amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the clear and convincing burden of proof required under the bill in proving that punitive damages should be awarded.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the "clear and convincing" burden of proof required under the bill in proving that punitive damages should be awarded, thereby restoring the burden of proof which each state currently applies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt (NC) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 278 (Roll no. 222).
